verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> again to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> there were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>women,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H517>mother:<s%>

And they <S%H2181>committed<s%> prostitutions in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> they <S%H2181>committed<s%> prostitutions in their <S%H5271>youth:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> were their <S%H7699>breasts<s%> <S%H4600>pressed,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H6213>bruised<s%> the <S%H1717>teats<s%> of their <S%H1331>virginity.<s%>

And the <S%H8034>names<s%> of them were <S%H170>Aholah<s%> the <S%H1419>elder,<s%> and <S%H172>Aholibah<s%> her <S%H269>sister:<s%> and they were mine, and they <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%> Thus were their <S%H8034>names;<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> is <S%H170>Aholah,<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H172>Aholibah.<s%>

And <S%H170>Aholah<s%> played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> when she was mine; and she <S%H5689>doted<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> her <S%H157>lovers,<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H804>Assyrians<s%> her <S%H7138>neighbors,<s%>

Which were <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H8504>blue,<s%> <S%H6346>captains<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H2531>desirable<s%> <S%H970>young<s%> men, <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> <S%H7392>riding<s%> on <S%H5483>horses.<s%>

Thus she <S%H5414>committed<s%> her <S%H8457>prostitutions<s%> with them, with all them that were the <S%H4005>chosen<s%> <S%H1121>men<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> on <S%H834>whom<s%> she <S%H5689>doted:<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H1544>idols<s%> she <S%H2930>defiled<s%> herself.

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> she her <S%H8457>prostitutions<s%> brought from <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> for in her <S%H5271>youth<s%> they <S%H7901>lay<s%> with her, and they <S%H6213>bruised<s%> the <S%H1717>breasts<s%> of her <S%H1331>virginity,<s%> and <S%H8210>poured<s%> their <S%H8457>prostitution<s%> on her.

<S%H3651>Why<s%> I have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> her into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of her <S%H157>lovers,<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>Assyrians,<s%> <S%H804><s%> on <S%H834>whom<s%> she <S%H5689>doted.<s%>

<S%H1992>These<s%> <S%H1540>discovered<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> they <S%H3947>took<s%> her <S%H1121>sons<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and slew her with the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> and she <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H8034>famous<s%> among <S%H802>women;<s%> for they had <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H8196>judgment<s%> on her.

And when her <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H172>Aholibah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> this, she was more <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> in her <S%H5691>inordinate<s%> <S%H5691>love<s%> than she, and in her <S%H8457>prostitutions<s%> more than her <S%H269>sister<s%> in her <S%H8457>prostitutions.<s%>

She <S%H5689>doted<s%> on the <S%H1121>Assyrians<s%> <S%H804><s%> her <S%H7138>neighbors,<s%> <S%H6346>captains<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> most <S%H4358>gorgeously,<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> <S%H7392>riding<s%> on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H2531>desirable<s%> <S%H970>young<s%> men.
Then I <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she was <S%H2930>defiled,<s%> that they took <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%>

And that she <S%H3254>increased<s%> her <S%H8457>prostitutions:<s%> for when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H2707>portrayed<s%> on the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> the <S%H6754>images<s%> of the <S%H3779>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H2710>portrayed<s%> with <S%H8350>vermilion,<s%>

<S%H2289>Girded<s%> with <S%H232>girdles<s%> on their <S%H4975>loins,<s%> <S%H5628>exceeding<s%> in <S%H2871>dyed<s%> <S%H2871>attire<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H7991>princes<s%> to <S%H4758>look<s%> to, after the <S%H1823>manner<s%> of the <S%H1121>Babylonians<s%> <S%H894><s%> of <S%H3778>Chaldea,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H4138>nativity:<s%>
And as <S%H4758>soon<s%> as she saw them with her <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> she <S%H5689>doted<s%> on them, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to them into <S%H3778>Chaldea.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>Babylonians<s%> <S%H894><s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to her into the <S%H4904>bed<s%> of <S%H1730>love,<s%> and they <S%H2930>defiled<s%> her with their <S%H8457>prostitution,<s%> and she was <S%H2930>polluted<s%> with them, and her <S%H5315>mind<s%> was <S%H3363>alienated<s%> from them.

So she <S%H1540>discovered<s%> her <S%H8457>prostitutions,<s%> and <S%H1540>discovered<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> then my <S%H5315>mind<s%> was <S%H3363>alienated<s%> from her, like as my <S%H5315>mind<s%> was <S%H5361>alienated<s%> from her <S%H269>sister.<s%>

Yet she <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> her <S%H8457>prostitutions,<s%> in <S%H2142>calling<s%> to <S%H2142>remembrance<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H5271>youth,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> she had played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

For she <S%H5689>doted<s%> on their <S%H6370>paramours,<s%> whose <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is as the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H2543>asses,<s%> and whose <S%H2231>issue<s%> is like the <S%H2231>issue<s%> of <S%H5483>horses.<s%>

Thus you <S%H6485>called<s%> to <S%H6485>remembrance<s%> the <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth,<s%> in <S%H6213>bruising<s%> your <S%H1717>teats<s%> by the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> for the <S%H7699>breasts<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> O <S%H172>Aholibah,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5782>raise<s%> up your <S%H157>lovers<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, from <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1992><s%> your <S%H5315>mind<s%> is <S%H5361>alienated,<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H5921>against<s%> you on <S%H5437>every<s%> <S%H5439>side;<s%>

The <S%H1121>Babylonians,<s%> <S%H894><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3779>Chaldeans,<s%> <S%H6489>Pekod,<s%> and <S%H7772>Shoa,<s%> and <S%H6970>Koa,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H804>Assyrians<s%> with them: <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H2531>desirable<s%> <S%H970>young<s%> men, <S%H6346>captains<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers,<s%> <S%H7991>great<s%> <S%H7991>lords<s%> and <S%H7121>renowned,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H7392>riding<s%> on <S%H5483>horses.<s%>

And they shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you with <S%H2021>chariots,<s%> <S%H7393>wagons,<s%> and <S%H1534>wheels,<s%> and with an <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H5971>people,<s%> which shall <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you <S%H6793>buckler<s%> and <S%H4043>shield<s%> and <S%H6959>helmet<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about: and I will <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and they shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> you according to their <S%H4941>judgments.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> against you, and they shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H2534>furiously<s%> with you: they shall <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> your <S%H639>nose<s%> and your <S%H241>ears;<s%> and your <S%H319>remnant<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> and your <S%H319>residue<s%> shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%> by the <S%H784>fire.<s%>
They shall also <S%H6584>strip<s%> you out of your <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> away your <S%H8597>fair<s%> <S%H3627>jewels.<s%>

Thus will I make your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from you, and your <S%H2184>prostitution<s%> brought from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> so that you shall not <S%H5375>lift<s%> up your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> you into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H8130>hate,<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them from <S%H834>whom<s%> your <S%H5315>mind<s%> is <S%H5361>alienated:<s%>

And they shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> with you <S%H8135>hatefully,<s%> and shall <S%H3947>take<s%> away <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3018>labor,<s%> and shall <S%H5800>leave<s%> you <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bore:<s%> and the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H2183>prostitutions<s%> shall be <S%H1540>discovered,<s%> both your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> and your <S%H8457>prostitutions.<s%>

I will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things to you, because you have gone a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you are <S%H2930>polluted<s%> with their <S%H1544>idols.<s%>
You have <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of your <S%H269>sister;<s%> therefore will I <S%H5414>give<s%> her <S%H3563>cup<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> You shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> of your <S%H269>sister's<s%> <S%H3563>cup<s%> <S%H6013>deep<s%> and <S%H7342>large:<s%> you shall be <S%H6712>laughed<s%> to scorn and had in <S%H3932>derision;<s%> it <S%H3557>contains<s%> <S%H4767>much.<s%>

You shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7943>drunkenness<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow,<s%> with the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H8047>astonishment<s%> and <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> with the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of your <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

You shall even <S%H8354>drink<s%> it and <S%H4680>suck<s%> it out, and you shall <S%H1633>break<s%> the <S%H2789>shards<s%> thereof, and <S%H5423>pluck<s%> off your own <S%H7699>breasts:<s%> for I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> you have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> me, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> me <S%H310>behind<s%> your <S%H1458>back,<s%> therefore <S%H5375>bear<s%> you <S%H1571>also<s%> your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> and your <S%H8457>prostitutions.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> moreover to me; <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> will you <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H170>Aholah<s%> and <S%H172>Aholibah?<s%> yes, <S%H5046>declare<s%> to them their <S%H8441>abominations;<s%>

That they have <S%H5003>committed<s%> <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> and <S%H1818>blood<s%> is in their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and with their <S%H1544>idols<s%> have they <S%H5003>committed<s%> <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> and have <S%H1571>also<s%> caused their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they <S%H3205>bore<s%> to me, to <S%H5674>pass<s%> for them through the fire, to <S%H402>devour<s%> them.

<S%H5750>Moreover<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> they have <S%H6213>done<s%> to me: they have <S%H2930>defiled<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> in the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths.<s%>

For when they had <S%H7819>slain<s%> their <S%H1121>children<s%> to their <S%H1544>idols,<s%> then they <S%H935>came<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> to <S%H2490>profane<s%> it; and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> have they <S%H6213>done<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of my <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And <S%H637>furthermore,<s%> that you have <S%H7971>sent<s%> for <S%H582>men<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H4801>far,<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H413><s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> was <S%H7971>sent;<s%> and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> they <S%H935>came:<s%> for <S%H834>whom<s%> you did <S%H7364>wash<s%> yourself, <S%H3583>painted<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H5710>decked<s%> yourself with <S%H5716>ornaments,<s%>

And <S%H3427>sat<s%> on a <S%H3520>stately<s%> <S%H4296>bed,<s%> and a <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6186>prepared<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> it, <S%H5921>whereupon<s%> you have <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H7004>incense<s%> and my <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

And a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> being at <S%H7961>ease<s%> was with her: and with the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H7230>common<s%> <S%H120>sort<s%> were <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H5433>Sabeans<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> which <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> on their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H5850>crowns<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>
Then <S%H559>said<s%> I to her that was <S%H1087>old<s%> in <S%H5004>adulteries,<s%> Will they <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2181>commit<s%> <S%H8457>prostitutions<s%> with her, and she with them?

Yet they <S%H935>went<s%> in to her, as they <S%H935>go<s%> in to a <S%H802>woman<s%> that plays the <S%H2181>harlot:<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> they in to <S%H170>Aholah<s%> and to <S%H172>Aholibah,<s%> the <S%H2154>lewd<s%> <S%H802>women.<s%>

And the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> they shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> them after the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of <S%H5003>adulteresses,<s%> and after the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of women that <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they are <S%H5003>adulteresses,<s%> and <S%H1818>blood<s%> is in their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> I will <S%H5927>bring<s%> up a <S%H6951>company<s%> on them, and will <S%H5414>give<s%> them to be <S%H2189>removed<s%> and <S%H957>spoiled.<s%>

And the <S%H6951>company<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> them with <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H1254>dispatch<s%> them with their <S%H2719>swords;<s%> they shall <S%H4191>slay<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> up their <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

Thus will I cause <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> out of the <S%H776>land,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> may be <S%H3256>taught<s%> not to <S%H6213>do<s%> after your <S%H2154>lewdness.<s%>

And they shall <S%H5414>recompense<s%> your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> on you, and you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2399>sins<s%> of your <S%H1544>idols:<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
